scripts.init:artisan: php artisan key:generate && php artisan storage:link
scripts.init:mailpit: curl -L -o mailpit.zip https://github.com/axllent/mailpit/releases/latest/download/mailpit-windows-amd64.zip && mkdir -p vendor/bin/mailpit && tar -xf mailpit.zip -C vendor/bin/mailpit/ && del mailpit.zip
scripts.init:core: npm run init:composer && npm run init:env && npm run init:artisan
scripts.init: npm run init:core && npm run init:mailpit
scripts.all: concurrently "npm run run:mailpit" "npm run dev" "npm run run:laravel"
